passives.name: Wound Extension
passives.desc:
Wound use +2

When using Wound:
 â€¢ Moderate BRV damage boost
 â€¢ Becomes group attack
 â€¢ Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
 â€¢ Moderate Poison boostã€? duration +2
 â€¢ Slight MAX BRV Down boostã€? duration +2
 â€¢ Self: 5 turns Unshaken Will
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack on target if BRV is at least 80% of MAX after last hit

While Unshaken Will active:
 â€¢ Wound becomes Wound+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; triggers additional  PF attack on target after use; deals 50% HP damage to non-targets; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt to target)
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (magic  PG attack; grants party BRV based on own ATK)
passives.short_desc: Wound Extension: Boost to Wound

passives.name: All Debuff Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV while an enemy is debuffed
passives.short_desc: All Debuff Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV

passives.name: Moonlight Extension
passives.desc:
Moonlight use +1

When using Moonlight:
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK
 â€¢ Slightly increased BRV multiplier
 â€¢ Additional magic  PG attack after BRV multiplier
 â€¢ Slight boost to ATK Upã€? extended to party
 â€¢ Granted buff duration +2
 â€¢ Inflicts 5 turns ATK Down I

While Unshaken Will active:
 â€¢ Moonlight becomes Moonlight+ (becomes group attack; deals proportionate HP damage to each target; moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt)
passives.short_desc: Moonlight Extension: Boost to Moonlight
